title: Healthy Mountain Dew, Wrestling Is Real 7.2.20
itunes:title: Healthy Mountain Dew, Wrestling Is Real 7.2.20
description:
In episode 664, Jack and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by comedian and Nerdificent co-host Dani Fernandez to discuss the Covid case numbers rising, the St. Louis couple who pulled out their guns on protestors, Trump believing wrestling is real, what gas station snacks they're buying, what we're watching for Monday, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Pandemic caused 18 pc rise in deaths in US: study
  2. Official U.S. coronavirus death toll is ‘a substantial undercount’ of actual tally, Yale study finds
  3. St. Louis couple pulls firearms on protesters cutting through their private street
  4. Calls for St. Louis Mayor’s Resignation Intensify After She Doxxed Black Lives Matter Protesters on Facebook Live
  5. Central West End couple explains why they pointed guns at protesters who demanded Krewson's resignation
  6. The Bio of the Lawyer Representing Two Gun-Toting St. Louis Attorneys Will Leave You Speechless
  7. Triple H: Donald Trump Is Unclear On Whether Wrestling Is Real
  8. WATCH: Peter Matthew Bauer / Wild Light

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
